fileheader.author: Brent Hugh
fileheader.description: Sopwith Camel with Weapons, matches available data for climb, max speed, general handling

function.description: q bar including the propulsion induced velocity.

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_moment_prop_torque_jsbsim_correction
function.description: This reverses the roll moment of the propeller, which we have reversed to compensate for the reversed sense of the gyroscopic moment in JSBSim
